definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: He drew the design on the stencil with a steel stylus.
sentences.chinese: 他用铁笔把设计图刻在蜡纸上。

sentences.english: Where graceful common vetch dehairing stencil paper has in Tong Ren sell?
sentences.chinese: 薇婷脱毛蜡纸在铜仁哪里有卖的？

sentences.english: Please line the cases with wax paper.
The master copy was too light, so many of the copies didn't come out clear.
sentences.chinese: 蜡纸底稿打得太轻，所以许多印出来的稿子看不清楚。

sentences.english: Soft cheeses, like Camembert, should be stored in waxed cheese paper or baking paper.
sentences.chinese: 卡门贝干酪等软乳酪应该储存在蜡纸或烘焙纸中。

sentences.english: Tailor the depilation wax paper into appropriate size.
sentences.chinese: 将脱毛蜡纸剪成合适大小。

sentences.english: Lay a sheet of wax paper on a hard surface.
sentences.chinese: 在坚实的平面上摊一层蜡纸。

sentences.english: You could apply rub-on transfers, decoupage or stencil on a pattern, too.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以使用印字，剪纸或蜡纸在一幅图案上。

sentences.english: Pick flowers and press them in wax paper.
sentences.chinese: 挑选花朵并把他们压在蜡纸里。

sentences.english: Learn to make ties for wax paper gift wraps in this free gift wrapping video.
sentences.chinese: 学会为蜡纸包装礼品包装视频关系在这个自由的礼物。

definition: to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation/to shave
to scrape off/to shave off (whiskers etc)/(of the wind) to blow sth away
red ink paste used for seal
